item.description: I love that I stumbled across this on an old internet friend’s site:

item.title: Objectivity (understanding)
item.description:
Does not exist as commonly understood.

Objectivity is still trapped in human subjectivity. It’s an implicit agreement on “the most true" subjective experience but is susceptible to the relativity of perspective we call (our) truth.

item.title: Kanban columns for lean publishing model
item.description:
#product-management #operations

What we used to keep Opensource.com flowing smoothly.

item.title: Learning demands change
item.description: [!quote] Unlike education, learning demands change. Learning makes us incompetent just before it enables us to grasp mastery. Learning opens our eyes and changes the way we see, communicate and act.
